title: 1 week to go
content:
The Building Letters charity project is now only a week from Launch, we've posted some type samples on the site : [http://www.buildingletters.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107014522/http:/www.buildingletters.org/)   
   
One thing which I think you'll all be interested in is the magazine which Max Kisman has put together for us. It has articles about African Alphabets and a great piece on the Highfield Art Club.   
   
Start the buzz, it will help us sell copies and raise the cash to build the orphanages which the project is all about.
author: union

comments.content: Jim I just sent 4 emails out to my designer friends telling them about the project. Hopefully they will tell 4 more and so on and so on. Dan
